mapper.insert: insert into t_complaint_residentarea (depend_date, record_time, ascription_city, phone_number, work_city, work_scene, work_cellname, live_city, live_scene, live_cellname, distance, live_cgi1, live_cgi2, live_cgi3, live_cellname1, live_cellname2, live_cellname3, workcgi, livecgi) values (#{depend_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ascription_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{work_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{work_scene,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{work_cellname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{live_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{live_scene,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{live_cellname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{live_cgi1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{live_cgi2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{live_cgi3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{live_cellname1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{live_cellname2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{live_cellname3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workcgi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{livecgi,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
